name: One bullet, One Life [Enhanced]
description:
One bullet, one life [enhanced]!

This game will test your dexterity and quick thinking to the limit. You have only one life and only one bullet in your chamber. Your goal is to defeat the ever spawning enemies until they eventually give up and you can get to the next level of this terrifyingly annoying dungeon.

What lies at the end?! Only the most skilled will find out!

This enhanced edition contains some minor bugfixes and some graphical improvements. To download the original please visit One bullet, one life [GM48.net]

How to play

This game is played with keyboard and mouse, when you've shot a bullet you need to pick it up to be able to shoot again.

  • MOVE...........................[W] [A] [S] [D]
  • AIM...............................[MOUSE]
  • SHOOT.........................[LEFT MOUSE BUTTON]
  • DODGE.........................[SHIFT]
  • QUIT.............................[ALT] + [F4]
Meet some of the characters

Hero
This is you! 

Blob
This one will try and jump attack you!

Ghost
Be careful with this one, it's invincible when it's invisible! 

Grouper

These guys always travel in a tight group. Watch out for their blinking eye, it means trouble is brewing. 

Nega-Hero
This guy is your exact opposite, he can be quite the challenge.
